html:
2nd Watch, Inc., a provider of building, deploying and managing Amazon Web Services (AWS)-based IT operations for enterprise customers, has acquired Aptitive Corp, a analytics and data consulting company that empowers organizations to access, analyze, and take action on their data. Both the companies involved in the transaction are based in US.

The acquisition also expands 2nd Watch's presence in the fast-growing Snowflake services universe and in several data-intensive vertical industries including retail and healthcare.

Deal In Brief

Deal TypeAcquisition
Sub-Category100% Acquisition
Deal StatusCompleted: 2022-01-05

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Aptitive Corp
Acquirer (Company)2nd Watch, Inc.

Deal Rationale

% Acquisition100%
